title: New: ATLAS – Hunter
body:
The more I hear of London songstress **ATLAS**, the more I’m convinced that it’s simply a question of time before she explodes amongst the realms of the blogosphere.

With her untouchably fragile vocals, yearning for understanding and a sense of belongng, Hunter may well be her most accomplished release to date. Again clocking in well over the six minute mark, it never ventures into tedium, in fact, once it finishes, one is left feeling slightly empty yet thoroughly enthralled. Check out _Hunter_ below, and keep up with **ATLAS** via her [Facebook](http://www.facebook.com/thisisatlasmusic) page.
